member.name: T:BingHomepage
member.summary: BingHomepage.CSharp library is powered by BingHomepageAPI which provides Bing's current homepage image details which include URL for image, Copyright information, and a Copyright link.

member.name: M:BingHomepage.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the BingHomepageAPI.
member.param: Country Code for which you want the image. Default: US.

member.name: M:BingHomepage.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the BingHomepageAPI.

member.name: P:BingHomepage.GetImageUrl
member.summary: Gets the image's URL on bing's server.

member.name: P:BingHomepage.GetCopyright
member.summary: Gets the Copyright information of the image.

member.name: P:BingHomepage.GetCopyrightLink
member.summary: Gets the Copyright Link of the image.

member.name: M:BingHomepage.GetImage(System.String)
member.summary: Downloads, stores, and returns the current Homepage Image.
member.param: Path to where the Image should be downloaded.
